thread.title: Fantastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel - Review of The Waldorf Hilton London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mounties022
title: Fantastic hotel
text:
Husband and I stayed here for one night last weekend, most fantastic hotel we have stayed in.
More expensive then most but worth every penny
Recommend breakfast to anyone booking the Waldorf but wait till you get to the hotel to get a nice discount
Will definitely look forward to staying here again
